text: brrda phu chod khela nı hmu mnusʹy nan ca klaw wa xari lea thi thahı phwk khea han xxk pi ca kkiblat khxng phwk khea thi phwk khea khey phin pi cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa this tawanxxk læa this tawantk nan pen siththi khx ngxallxhˌ theanan phraxngkh ca thrng næana phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh pi su thang xan theiyngtrng
